body: I would just avoid `TF_PREDICT_TRUE` here. It places the rest of the code in the cold section, which will pretty much always generate a page fault, so for this somewhat infrequent path, it will be very slow. I feel that it's better to take a little of code bloat here than taking a huge hit for some users.
